amendment.description: To amend title 10, United States Code, to exempt abortions of pregnancies in cases of rape and incest from a limitation on use of Department of Dense funds.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3367 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S7152-7160; text: CR S7156) To amend title 10, United States Code, to exempt abortions of pregnancies in cases of rape and incest from a limitation on use of Department of Dense funds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3367 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3367 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer.
